thread.title: Smoking ruins of Islamist militants' Congo jungle base

title: Smoking ruins of Islamist militants' Congo jungle base
text:
Smoking ruins of Islamist militants' Congo jungle base 4:50pm GMT - 01:16 
The Democratic Republic of Congo's army says their assault on an Islamist militant base hidden in dense jungle was an important victory, as the country risks sliding into another cycle of war. Matthew Larotonda reports.   
The Democratic Republic of Congo's army says their assault on an Islamist militant base hidden in dense jungle was an important victory, as the country risks sliding into another cycle of war. Matthew Larotonda reports.  //reut.rs/2CG5bMV
